solution_line_template: Last week, Arman earned {last_week_hours} hours x ${hourly_rate_last_week}/hour = $<<{last_week_hours}*{hourly_rate_last_week}={earnings_last_week}>>{earnings_last_week}.
This week, Arman could earn {this_week_hours} hours x ${hourly_rate_this_week}/hour = $<<{this_week_hours}*{hourly_rate_this_week}={earnings_this_week}>>{earnings_this_week}.
So, he will receive ${earnings_last_week} + ${earnings_this_week} = $<<{earnings_last_week}+{earnings_this_week}={total_earnings}>>{total_earnings} for working two weeks.
